            </gmd:citation>
            <gmd:abstract>
                <gco:CharacterString>The Kingston Monitoring Hub continues Lake Ontario Waterkeeper’s work in Kingston by helping people access the Kingston waterfront with up to date water quality data.

Kingston, Frontenac, Lennox and Addington Public Health (KFL&A Public Health) monitors 7 beaches in the City of Kingston. The rest of the shoreline is not monitored, but many people use these waters to swim, boat, paddle, surf, and fish.

Kingston Monitoring Hub began collecting water samples and testing for E. coli in 2020. E. coli is an indicator for sewage—the more E. coli present in a sample, the greater the risk to public health and the environment.

Staff along with a group of trained citizen scientists sample the water every Wednesday during the summer months. We sample three main locations: Hospital Beach, Olympic Harbour Beach, and Doug Fluhrer Park. We have added these locations to Swim Guide, and we update them weekly.</gco:CharacterString>
            </gmd:abstract>

name: 10-25976-2ct1-7161
notes:
The Kingston Monitoring Hub continues Lake Ontario Waterkeeper’s work in Kingston by helping people access the Kingston waterfront with up to date water quality data.

Kingston, Frontenac, Lennox and Addington Public Health (KFL&A Public Health) monitors 7 beaches in the City of Kingston. The rest of the shoreline is not monitored, but many people use these waters to swim, boat, paddle, surf, and fish.

Kingston Monitoring Hub began collecting water samples and testing for E. coli in 2020. E. coli is an indicator for sewage—the more E. coli present in a sample, the greater the risk to public health and the environment.

Staff along with a group of trained citizen scientists sample the water every Wednesday during the summer months. We sample three main locations: Hospital Beach, Olympic Harbour Beach, and Doug Fluhrer Park. We have added these locations to Swim Guide, and we update them weekly.

notes_translated.en:
The Kingston Monitoring Hub continues Lake Ontario Waterkeeper’s work in Kingston by helping people access the Kingston waterfront with up to date water quality data.

Kingston, Frontenac, Lennox and Addington Public Health (KFL&A Public Health) monitors 7 beaches in the City of Kingston. The rest of the shoreline is not monitored, but many people use these waters to swim, boat, paddle, surf, and fish.

Kingston Monitoring Hub began collecting water samples and testing for E. coli in 2020. E. coli is an indicator for sewage—the more E. coli present in a sample, the greater the risk to public health and the environment.

Staff along with a group of trained citizen scientists sample the water every Wednesday during the summer months. We sample three main locations: Hospital Beach, Olympic Harbour Beach, and Doug Fluhrer Park. We have added these locations to Swim Guide, and we update them weekly.
notes_translated.fr:
Le centre de surveillance de Kingston poursuit le travail de Lake Ontario Waterkeeper à Kingston en aidant les gens à accéder au front de mer de Kingston grâce à des données à jour sur la qualité de l'eau.

Le service de santé publique de Kingston, Frontenac, Lennox et Addington (KFL&A Public Health) surveille 7 plages de la ville de Kingston. Le reste du littoral n'est pas surveillé, mais de nombreuses personnes utilisent ces eaux pour nager, faire du bateau, pagayer, surfer et pêcher.

Le centre de surveillance de Kingston a commencé à prélever des échantillons d'eau et à effectuer des tests pour détecter la présence d'E. coli en 2020. E. coli est un indicateur des eaux usées : plus il y a d'E. coli dans un échantillon, plus le risque pour la santé publique et l'environnement est élevé.

Le personnel et un groupe de scientifiques citoyens qualifiés prélèvent des échantillons d'eau tous les mercredis pendant les mois d'été. Nous échantillonnons trois sites principaux : Hospital Beach, Olympic Harbour Beach et Doug Fluhrer Park. Nous avons ajouté ces emplacements au Swim Guide, et nous les mettons à jour chaque semaine.

notes_translation_method.fr: Description text translated using the Amazon translate service / texte traduit à l'aide du service Amazon translate

description_translated.en: DataStream is an open access platform for sharing water and sediment quality data.
description_translated.fr: DataStream est une plateforme en libre accès pour partager des données sur la qualité de l'eau et des sédiments.
